content.description: Climb the spicy, crystally slab dike to the top.
content.location: Above the Krazy Krag boulder. climb the 4th class rock scramble to the left of Bracchiotomy.

content.description: Climb the obvious wide crack out the roof to a horizontal, mantle into the chimney and top out.

Start at the tree growing out of right to left low angle diagonal off width crack, ending at the chimney on Krazy Krack. 

  You can either wedge yourself inside the crack (5.5), walk along the crack (5.7) or Hand traverse the lip and mantle into the chimney (5.9) 

  Just a super fun and silly problem.
content.location: To the left of Krazy Kracks

content.description: Sit start the right arete, low foot, both hands on the arete or your right on the arete and your left hand underclinging the block. Work your way up the arete and follow it around the horn until you can rock over on to the arete top out.
content.location: Just as you clear the Corridor, where Good Godfrey is located, look to your right and down the hill you'll see a small group of boulders, with an old fire pit under it.

content.description: Sit start on the face to the left of the arete for Dumplington Spike. Low foot, left hand on a small crimp, right hand on the arete. Work up the face and finish up Dumplinton Spike.
content.location: Just as you clear the Corridor, where Good Godfrey is located, look to your right and down the hill you'll see a small group of boulders, with an old fire pit under it.

content.description: Start on the left side of the boulder and hand traverse under the route.
content.location: The first problem you see on the Krazy Krags

content.description: Is a series of small crags and a boulder with variety of boulder problems on them.
